page.title: 06SURGERY AND BUS SERVICES
page.content: Blake House Surgery has been open for 11 years. It opens every day except Sunday.There is a waiting room, consulting rooms and a dispensary. About 25 patients attend daily, and the doctor averages 4 visits. Most common ailments are influenza, high blood pressure, anaemia, heart trouble and kidney infections. Cases needing hospital treatment normally go to Barnstaple. As well as the doctor there is a practice manager, 3 receptionists and a district nurse. There is a weekly bus service to Holsworthy on Wednesday, which is market day.It calls at several villages, leaving in the morning and returning in the afternoon. Other services go to Plymouth on Thursdays and to Exeter on Fridays. Children who attend Holsworthy Community College travel on a school bus.
